multiplechoiceresponse.label: What does random.randint(1, 10) do in Python?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Generates a random integer between 1 and 10, inclusive.
Generates a random floating-point number between 1 and 10.
Generates a random string with a length between 1 and 10.
Shuffles a list of numbers between 1 and 10.
